name: Eyuphuro
description: '''Eyuphuro''' is a [[Mozambique|Mozambican]] band. Eyuphuro's music is a combination of traditional [[Africa]]n music and western [[popular music]]. Eyuphuro's music is sung mostly in [[Makhuwa language|Makua]], a [[Bantu languages|Bantu]] language. The name of the band means "whirlwind" in Macua.
